english.segment1: I seek the silence through the chaos and the noise. That's when I'm listening, I want to hear Your voice. Sometimes, it softly speaks, a whisper on the wind. Sometimes, it's louder when Your Spirit rushes in
english.segment2: I can feel it all around me, I can feel it all around me
english.segment3: I keep on searching for Your presence in this place. I see Your hand at work, I feel Your touch of grace. Sometimes, it falls like rain upon this thirsty land. Sometimes, You gently stir the heart of every man
english.segment4: I can feel it, I can feel it. I can feel Your heartbeat
english.segment5: I pray You'd send Your presence down, send it down. Fill us with Your Spirit now.
